ComicInfo.Characters: Major Diane LaSalle,Nychus,Weatherman One [Henry Bendix],Diva,Winter,Warguard [Talos,Cannon],Fuji,Backlash,Stormwatch [Battalion [Jackson King],Hexon],Daemonites

ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:48:01 [Issue ID 4000-38067] urn:comicvine:4000-38067 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 06:39:00. [Issue ID 53936]
ComicInfo.Summary: Stormwatch battles the possessed Warguard and are able to drive the alien Daemonites from their bodies. Backlash is also able to free Diane from her possession but she is left in a permanent coma as the alien has stolen a portion of her psyche.
ComicInfo.Writer: Brandon Choi,Jim Lee,Sean Ruffner,Brandon Choi,Jim Lee,Sean Ruffner
